channel.title: Need help with a code
channel.description:
Hello, thankyou for takeing your time to read this; please note I have bad spelling. Ok! The thing I am struggleing with is : Makeing items (ie all godsword pieces to make 1 godsword)
So I need some braniac who can help me. (((simplified)))
I need to make a code which means I need the following items in my invantory the hole time :
item id ________________ bandos hilt : 15338 godsword shard 1: 15341 godsword shard 2: 15342 godsword shard 3: 15343 ______________________________________ I also need it so if I use any of these items with eachother it will make the bandos godsword (15334)
And I also need it so you need 95 smithing to make the godsword.
Can anyone help me out please?

il give it a shot! thankx!

item.title: Need help with a code
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

else if(itemUsed == hilt id[ && useWith == shard id && hasItemAny(one part,1) && hasItemAny(another part,1)) { deleteItem(1st item,getItemSlot(1st item), 1); deleteItem(2nd item,getItemSlot(2nd item), 1); deleteItem(3rd item ,getItemSlot(3rd item), 1); deleteItem(4th item,getItemSlot(4th item), 1); addItem(sword, 1); }

Change the words: hilt id, shard id, one part, another part, 1st item, 2nd item, 3rd item, and 4th item to the correct numbers.

Hope it helped

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a code
item.dc:creator: @liverare liverare
item.description:
@liverare wrote:

OMG THE CODE I PUT IN DOSE NOT WORK!!
any suggestions on how to fix the code? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2008, 03:27:39 PM[/size][hr]CAN SOMEONE PLEASE GIVE ME THE CODE WHICH I NEED TO MAKE BANDOS GODSWORD!
I NEED THE CODE TO INCLUDE :

Must have all 4 items so it can make 1 item and delete the 4 items.

so if i use :

15338 with 15341 it will delete 15338, 15341, 15342, 15343 and give me 15334.
I need to have ALL the items in bag ecept 15334 to make 15334.
I will also need it so you need 90 smithink to make it!
CAN ANYONE PLEASE HELP ME![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2008, 03:36:41 PM[/size][hr]What I need is simular to runescape !
On dragon slayer quest on runescape you need ALL 3 pieces of the map befor you can make the big map to give to the priat.

How can I do that?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2008, 03:40:39 PM[/size][hr]BUMP! Keep my post nice and fresh

Still, come on people! Im sure someone can help me here!!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a code

@liverare wrote:

Yes but thats horrible!
By doing that all you will need is shard 1 and hilt.
It will delete the other items if you got them in your invantory but!
I think I have done it 

        } else if (useItemID == (id of hilt) && atObjectID == 2783) // Make Bandos Godsword
        {
            sendMessage(
                    "You conbine all the parts of the godsword!");
	    PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " HAS JUST MADE A BANDOS GODSWORD!";
            addSkillXP((99900 * playerLevel[13]), 13);

            deleteItem(15341, getItemSlot(15341), 1);
            deleteItem(15342, getItemSlot(15342), 1);
            deleteItem(15343, getItemSlot(15343), 1);
            addItem(15334, 1);
	    else if(playerLevel[13] <= 94)
            {
            sendMessage("You need 95 Smithing to combine parts of a godsword.");

item.title: Need help with a code
item.dc:creator: @darkness101 darkness101
item.description:
@darkness101 wrote:

Sorry, Here you go:

else if(useItemID == 536 && atObjectID == 5284) // Bone grinding { sendMessage("You combine the Hilt and the Shard 1."); deleteItem(15338,getItemSlot(536), 1); deleteItem(15341,getItemSlot(536), 1); deleteItem(15342,getItemSlot(536), 1); deleteItem(15343,getItemSlot(536), 1); addItem(GODSWORD ID,getItemSlot(536), 1); }

EX: you use the shard 1 with the hilt. It deleates all the items needed for the godsword, then adds the godsword.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a code
item.dc:creator: @liverare liverare
item.description:
@liverare wrote:

I not saying I aint greatfull but how do you make it so you need all 4 items to make the godsword by using 1 shard with hilt.
Basicly
Make it so you need all 4 items (use any with eachother) and it will make the godsword
but if you havent got all 4 then it dose not work.

item.title: Need help with a code
item.dc:creator: @darkness101 darkness101
item.description:
@darkness101 wrote:

Lolz? Kind of easy.

  1. Search This in client.java:
else if (useItemID

And then you should see something like this:

else if(useItemID == 536 && atObjectID == 5284) // Bone grinding { sendMessage("You grind the "+GetItemName(536)+" and recieve prayer xp."); addSkillXP((152*playerLevel[5]), 5); deleteItem(536,getItemSlot(536), 1); }

For instance, we will make the hilt work with the shard 1.

else if(useItemID == 536 && atObjectID == 5284) // Bone grinding { sendMessage("You combine the Hilt and the Shard 1."); deleteItem(15338,getItemSlot(536), 1); deleteItem(15341,getItemSlot(536), 1); addItem(GODSWORD ID,getItemSlot(536), 1); }

Ok idk if this will work, but I think it will.

add this to the end:

else if(playerLevel[13] <= 96) { sendMessage("You need 95 Smithing to combine parts of a godsword.");

If this dosenâ€™t work:

add enums

And if you get 100 error think, still add enums

Happy Coding!

Read full topic
